overview: Electro-R&B experimentalist FKA twigs channels her inner David Lynch in a 16-minute short film featuring four tracks from her new EP, M3LL155X. The twigs-directed videos for “Figure 8,” “I’m Your Doll,” “In Time” and “Glass & Patron” are woven into an eye-popping exploration of what a statement calls “the process of feeling pregnant with pain, birthing creativity and liberation.”
title: M3LL155X
